#include<stdio.h>
long long int powe(long long int n);
int main()
{
    long long int t,n,x,c,y;
    while(scanf("%lld",&n)!=EOF)
    {
              x=0;c=0;y=1;
              while((n/y)!=0)
              {
                         x++;
                         y=powe(x);
                         c=c+(n/y);
              }
              printf("%lld\n",c);
    }
    return 0;
}
long long int powe(long long int n)
{
     long long int r=1,y=5;
     while(n>1)
     {
               if(n&1)
               r*=y;
               n/=2;
               y*=y;
     }
     r*=y;
     return r;
}
